clues.clue: Too old at 20 for the Naval Academy, Ike graduated from this academy, class of 1915, at 24
Eisenhower renamed this presidential retreat formerly known as Shangri-La for his grandson
In 1950, after retiring from active duty, Eisenhower was tapped to be supreme commander of this new military alliance
In retirement, Ike enjoyed painting, golf & spending time with Mamie at their farm adjoining this military park & battlefield
Opened in 2020, the Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial is the first public work in Washington, D.C. by this renowned American architect
The Munch Museum says this painting's motif was probably inspired by a stroll the artist took in 1891 as the sun set over Oslo Fjord
In 1930 she did a series of 6 paintings of an oversized jack-in-the-pulpit flower
This 5-letter word follows "wood" in the printing technique used by Japanese masters like Hiroshige

For a sculpture called "La France", he used the features of Camille Claudel, a sculptor who was also his assistant & lover
Mickey Mantle's No. 7 jersey was retired in an emotional ceremony at this venue in 1969
This rite is the first of the Catholic Church's list of 7 sacraments
By around 700 A.D. this hyphenated people had formed 7 separate kingdoms in Britain, known as the Heptarchy

When this actor played George of the Jungle way back in 1997, he was joined on screen by Tookie
A macaw named Blu heads to Brazil & meets a toucan named Rafael in the animated movie with this 3-letter title

A card in this game offers "a ride on the Reading", with a possibility of even getting paid to do so!
This casino game with numbers on a ticket from 1 to 80 is of Chinese origin & dates back at least 2,000 years

This 5-letter card game of English origin helped construct some bridges--auction bridge & contract bridge
In the "Odyssey", it's called the Aegyptus
No respect! Though more than 2,300 miles long, this North American river is still just a tributary

The name of this great river comes from words meaning "place to paddle" in the language of the Warao of Venezuela

Weena, an Eloi, & Morlocks, as the main guy really gets around
In 1986 3 physics winners were honored for designing the electron & scanning tunneling types of these
Max Theiler's 1951 prize was for discoveries that helped combat this "colorful" mosquito-borne tropical disease

James Peebles' work was in the physical type of this -ology, checking off little items like the origin & structure of the universe
Gerhard Herzberg's 1971 chemistry prize citation noted his work on these highly reactive molecules with unpaired electrons
This "porcine" term derived from the way bags were carried on shoulders
Nothing to do with a gospel writer, this word meaning "tepid" comes from Old English
This term for a dashing swordsman comes from his practice of striking his own shield with his sword during combat

Taylor Swift said she was up very late writing the songs that make up this 2022 album, hence its title
On hits like "I Love Rock 'N Roll" & "Crimson & Clover", she was backed by The Blackhearts
On "Truth Hurts", Lizzo rhymes "fresh photos with the bomb lighting" & "new man on" this NFL team
In 2022 she was free to duet with Elton John on the song "Hold Me Closer"
An outlier ballad from this British metal band was "Changes" in 1972; it was rarely performed live
It tells NFL coaches the game or half is getting near the end & the rules will slightly alter
Put 7 letters before "ultimate" to get this word meaning the one before the next to last

final_jeopardy.clue: Poseidon carried off the maiden Theophane & turned her into a ewe; their offspring was the source of this mythical object
